com.google.android.pinnedheader.headerlist

Class ListPinnedHeaderView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • com.google.android.pinnedheader.headerlist.ListPinnedHeaderView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class ListPinnedHeaderView
extends android.view.ViewGroup
    A custom view for the pinned section header shown at the top of the contact list.
